none: Mitchell, S. Augustus (Samuel Augustus), 1792-1868. New universal atlas. Philadelphia : S. Augustus Mitchell, 1847. [No.] 11

Scale approximately 1:16,500 (W 73°59ʹ35ʺ--W 73°59ʹ35ʺ/N 40°43ʹ27ʺ--N 40°43ʹ27ʺ) ; Relief shown pictorially.; Includes ward boundaries and tables of reference to public buildings, squares, markets, hotels and churches.; "Entered according to the act of Congress in the year 1846, by H.N. Burroughs in the Clerk's Office of the District Court for the Eastern District of Pennsylvania."; Appears in: Mitchell, S.A. A new universal atlas. Philadelphia, 1847. No. 11. ; Covers Manhattan south from 39th Street, and parts of Brooklyn and Williamsburg.
